revisionDesc.change: changed spelling 'doller' to 'dollar' in the phrase 'and sent her one dollar and'
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Corrected name to Mann based on LOC letter.
Reviewing correcting; add date annotation; update Hannah's thumb.
corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i have received your letter
to day although it was short it was better than none i am always glad to hear from you if its only a line i have to announce the death of little Charley manMann he died last thursday Thursday morning with the diptherea diphtheria croup suffered very much so pressed for breath poor little boy it made me feel real sad he and Janey was up in my room on saturday Saturday and he set in a chair quiet so unusual for him he dident didn't seem to be very well and sunday Sunday he was not so well and lived till thursday Thursday poor little fellow i miss him very much they had the funeral last sunday Sunday
he was put in a casket lined with white satin cost 100 dollerdollars)

well Walter i have had a letter from Jeff and one from Matty the letter you sent of mine stirred them up matt said i wrote to you i dident didn't know what i would do if it wasent wasn't for your letters the rest dident didn't put themselves out to write to me she said she knew i meant them so now she will write every sunday Sunday i wrote to her yesterday) and to han to day and sent her one dollar and 25 cts) i have had a letter from her a good letter she says she shall come home she cant can't doo do so well in fixing her things in consequence of losing her thumb i sent her a dollar the other time and i wrote for her to get her things made and i would send her some change every time to pay it she wonders why walterWalter dont don't write to her as he used to when you write walterWalter dear put a couple of dollars in the letter its it's better to not put much in a letter in these days there is so many broken open and robbed

postscript.p: has mrMr. Oconor O'Connor got home yet)
georgeGeorge is away to camden Camden
